summary: Diff adds domain/app-name validation + an automated mainnet publish/record script, and enhances the deployment artifact recorder. However, the diff does not provide evidence of an actual completed IC mainnet deploy, a recorded non-empty live URL/IDs in DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md, or that the validated app/domain name is actually used to prevent the publish-time domain validation failure. Additionally, many frontend pages/styles appear modified beyond the deploy/link-recording scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Complete a successful Internet Computer mainnet publish/deploy of the existing QA Management app and produce a shareable public website URL for the deployed frontend canister.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only adds scripts/runbooks; it does not show evidence of an actual mainnet deployment having been completed or a concrete frontend canister URL being produced/shared as an artifact in-repo.

missing_requirements.requirement: Resolve the publish-time domain validation failure by ensuring the deployment/publish flow uses a domain/app name that is 5–50 characters and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
missing_requirements.reason: A validator/normalizer is added, but the publish script (as shown) runs `dfx deploy --network ic` without showing any step that applies the normalized app/domain name to the actual publish/deploy configuration (e.g., passing it into the publish pipeline or updating relevant config). Therefore it’s not evidenced that the domain validation failure is actually prevented.

missing_requirements.requirement: After a successful mainnet deploy, update frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md with the latest frontend and backend canister IDs and the generated public website link using the existing recordDeploymentArtifact.js script (or an equivalent automated step).
missing_requirements.reason: DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md in the diff still contains a placeholder 'Not yet deployed' section, not non-empty canister IDs and a live URL matching `https://<frontendId>.icp0.io`. The recorder script is enhanced, but the required updated artifact content is not present in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of frontend UI/page/style changes (dashboard/bugs/test cases/test runs pages, app shell, router, Tailwind/theme) not directly required for enabling mainnet publish and recording the deployment link.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly avoid adding new product features beyond enabling successful publish/link recording; the diff summary indicates many application pages and UI infrastructure were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of a new deployment runbook document (DEPLOY_MAINNET.md).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested; only automated recording via recordDeploymentArtifact.js (or equivalent automated step) was required. Documentation may be helpful but is extra relative to stated requirements.
